findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner can stop transactions for all users excluding themselves by setting the feeDenominator to zero.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner can increase fees over the allowed limit of 25% by calling the setFees function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner can stop contracts from transactions by calling the enable_blacklist and manage_blacklist functions.

findings.title: FSA - Fixed Swap Address
findings.description: The swap address is assigned once in the constructor and cannot be changed, which may not allow the contract to catch up with future swap updates.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming convention.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are unused state variables in the contract.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: There are functions that have no event emitted, making it difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are variables defined in local scope and not initialized.
